1.details: Install rustc and cargo via rustup. This is required for all MultiOS components which are written in Rust.

2.details: QEMU installation requires system-level privileges (sudo/root access) which are not available in this environment. QEMU can be installed via 'sudo apt install qemu-system-x86 qemu-system-arm qemu-system-riscv' once system access is available.

3.details: Fix broken node_modules and update all package.json dependencies across community, academic, and marketing components.

4.details: Upgrade all requirements.txt files across deployment, community, academic, and real-world components.

5.details: Successfully installed CMake 4.1.2 via pip. Git and make were already available. CMake is now functional for building MultiOS components.
